name: Baykuş Music
overview:
It all started in a small home studio in 1996. Time passed, making music transcended its borders. Compositions, recordings, projects urged the need to change the structure into a new formation. Making music, talking about music. Being a large family and expanding the dream.

And this is how Baykuş Music is founded in 2005. The main focus of interest is jazz, folk and alternative music genres. The first album Kolektif / Balkanatolia is ensued by Gevende / Ev, Kurka / Kaba Saz and Cenk Erdoğan Trio / Ile. Now, Baykuş Music is active in the fields of production and edition, management and music events.

Baykuş Music, that aims to keep on with an intellectual background to listen to all sounds surrounding us, and to perceive what we see, continues its journey!
